mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (id, reply_content, reply_status, member_id, post_id) values (#{id}, #{replyContent}, #{replyStatus},#{memberId},#{postId});
mapper.select: select id, reply_content, reply_status, created_date, updated_date,member_id, post_id from tbl_reply where post_id = #{postId} AND reply_status = 'VISIBLE' order BY created_date DESC
select count(*) from tbl_reply where post_id = #{postId}
